summary: puts  actors that is named Dovah Soldier in the World that travel from The Bannered Mare in Whiterun too riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn and then back to The Bannered Mare in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
i have done a update that add a dovha Soldier patrol from four shield inn to Silver-Blood Inn i Markarth o and so that pepole know if you download the update just replace the Dovah Soldier esp you have if you just have download the mod for the first time. download the update if you whant  two patrols of dovah Soldiers  they walk when they patrol so it my take times for them to get to the end of they patrol (so that they go back and begin again) 


i have done a version of the mod without dlc needed for them that dont have DLC dragonborn and 
i have upload a update version with Dovah Soldiers that travel from four shield tavern  to Silver-Blood Inn in Markarth  


Dawnguard download Vanilla Dovah Soldier (they mostly stay in Riverwood Sleeping Giant in most of the Days ) but remeber that im not finish with that version so if you wondering anyting about that version like if im going to make them patrol more places then make a comment and i try to answer them


puts  actors that is named Dovah Soldier in the World that travel from The Bannered Mare in Whiterun too riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn and then back to The Bannered Mare in Whiterun 

and  they go back and forth between The Bannered Mare and Sleeping Giant Inn 

and if the  player gets attack (for what ever reason that my be) and Dovah soldier  is near they will defend the player against the enemys of the player (so be carefull not to be near them when they attack your enemys) they will attack all hostile to the player


any questions or if you wondering anything about the mod  make a comment
o and you need both dragonborn dlc and dawnguard but you dont need them if you download Vanilla Dovah Soldier



and non of the mods in the screenshots is use in the mod 


i my in the future add more Groups that travel from other cities to mines and other places

thanks to the pepole who donwload my mod if you like it dont forget to endorse the mod :)
author: robin19
